Name: Void Raiders
About the game: Void Raiders is sci-fi top down shooter focused on character progression and shooting both humans & aliens that stands in your way to become most feared raider on Neptune planet. Blast your way through many exotic locations, collect mysterious artifacts, powefull relics and shards of power to upgrade your characters, their equipment and even Lone Invader tavern whitch serves as a base of your marauding operations.
Meta Title: Void Raiders: Jun 14, 2016, Tryzna83 and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Void Raiders? Check out the release date (Jun 14, 2016), developer insights from Tryzna83, and a complete game summary.
